titleStmt.title: An elegy on the death of that eminent minister of the Gospel, Mr. George Cokayn, who exchanged this mortal for an immortal life, the 21st of November, 1691.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed, and are to be sold by Richard Baldwin near the Oxford-Arms-Inn, Warwick-Lane.,

notesStmt.note: Verse - "What still more breaches! is Cokayn dead?".
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
